dataset.name: ds1
dataset.sql: select * from ( select t.* from ( select * from (select vl.id,vl.vid_id,vl.subject,vl.covre,vl.STATUS_TIME,vl.if_login as if_login,vl.organizer_token,vl.start_time,vl.end_time,nvl(vl.serial_number,10000000)as serial_number,'1' as flag from vms_live_info vl where vl.if_status='2' and vl.end_time > sysdate and vl.if_del='1' and vl.opended='true' order by vl.serial_number asc,vl.STATUS_TIME desc) t1 union select * from (select vc.id,vc.vid_id,vc.name,vc.cover,vc.UP_TIME,vc.if_login,'' as organizer_token,null as start_time,null as end_time,nvl(vc.serial_number,10000000)as serial_number,'2' as flag from vms_cast_info vc where vc.IF_SHELVES='1' and vc.if_del='1' order by vc.serial_number asc,vc.UP_TIME desc)t2 )t order by t.flag asc,t.serial_number asc,t.start_time,t.STATUS_TIME desc ) where rownum<8
